content: Hanyu Shi received the B.Sc, M.Sc, and Ph.D. degrees from Beijing Normal University in 2014, 2017, and 2022, respectively. He is a professor at Southwest University, Chongqing, China. His research interests include radiative transfer and parameter estimation.

title: Hanyu Shi
